gridlineAutoScale.title: Scale by width
gridlineAutoScale.description: Automatically adjust the spacing between dashes and dots based on line width.

innerPadding.title: Space between categories
innerPadding.description: Space between categories (inner padding) as a percentage of the total category width/height.

labelPrecision.title: Value decimal places
labelPrecision.description: Select the number of decimal places to display for the values

maxMarginFactor.title: Maximum size
maxMarginFactor.description: The maximum percent of the visual allowed for the axis

treatNullsAsZero.title: Show blank values
treatNullsAsZero.description: Visualize blank values in your data as zeroes

dataVolume.title: Data Volume
dataVolume.description: Adjust the data point limit for this chart

responsive.title: Responsive
responsive.description: The visual will adapt to size changes

position.title: Position
position.description: Arrange relative to chart data points

showTitle.title: Title
showTitle.description: Display a title for legend symbols

borderColorMatchFill.title: Match fill color
borderColorMatchFill.description: Match the border color to the main shape color.

lowerShadingColor.title: Lower shading
lowerShadingColor.description: Shading color of the lower region

upperShadingColor.title: Upper shading
upperShadingColor.description: Shading color of the upper region

autoScale.title: Scale by width
autoScale.description: Automatically adjust the spacing between dashes and dots based on line width.

dataLabelColor.title: Color
dataLabelColor.description: Set the reference line data label color

dataLabelHorizontalPosition.title: Horizontal position
dataLabelHorizontalPosition.description: Set the horizontal position for the reference line data label

dataLabelShow.title: Data label
dataLabelShow.description: Display a data label for the reference line

dataLabelVerticalPosition.title: Vertical position
dataLabelVerticalPosition.description: Set the vertical position for the reference line data label

shadeColorMatchStroke.title: Match line color
shadeColorMatchStroke.description: Match the legend icon color to the color of the line, not the marker

combineSeries.title: Combine series
combineSeries.description: Show one trend line per series or combine
